Description:
Located within a 10-minute walk of the center of Aix-en-Provence, Renaissance Aix-en-Provence Hotel features free access to a spa with a heated indoor pool, steam room, fitness room, and 2 treatment cabins are also available. It offers a 24-hour front desk, free WiFi and newspapers.

The spacious guest rooms all feature garden or city views. They come with a private bathroom with a bath or shower.

Various breakfast options such as American, continental and a breakfast buffet are available for guests. The hotel also offers a bistro and a bar.

Guests can go golfing 1.9 mi away, bowling 0.6 mi away or horse riding 1.2 mi away. The Grand Theater is 656 feet away. Marseille-Marignane Airport is a 25-minute drive away.
Facilities: 2 swimming pools, Private Parking, Spa, Free Wifi, Family rooms, 2 restaurants, Fitness center, Tea/Coffee Maker in All Rooms, Bar, Good Breakfast

Description:
Surrounded by a beautiful garden, Aquabella offers Provencal-style rooms and guests have free access to the spa. It is located in central Aix-en-Provence, a short walk from the old town.

The guest rooms at the Aquabella are all air-conditioned and equipped with free Wi-Fi access and mini-bars. Bathrobes are also provided.

Guests can enjoy Mediterranean cuisine in the hotel restaurant, L’Orangerie. 

Guests can relax at the Aquabella’s Sensoriel Spa. Guests have access to the sauna, hammam, and hot bath. There is also a Kneipp shower and ice fountain.

Guests will find public parking just 164 feet away from the property, available at an extra cost.
Facilities: Outdoor swimming pool, Parking, Spa, Restaurant, Fitness center, Non-smoking rooms, Facilities for disabled guests, Bar, Excellent Breakfast

Description:
This boutique design hotel is located in the center of Aix-en-Provence and offers 55 rooms. If features a terrace and a lounge.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel Cézanne have free WiFi access.  All rooms include satellite TV with more than 50 channels and some have views over the town.

At Hôtel Cézanne there is a terrace with an outdoor bar, where guests can enjoy an aperitif. There is also a meeting room.

Breakfast can be taken until 10:30 and offers fresh juice bar, home-made savory dishers, pastries, pancakes, brioche, artisanal charcuterie boards, jam from Hautes-Alpes and a gluten-free selection. It can be enjoyed in the outdoor bar in fine weather.

The property is 656 feet from the Cours Mirabeau and 984 feet from a bus station, with connections to the airport and the TGV train station. Aix-en-Provence TGV train station is 7.5 mi from the hotel.

The rooms at the Boutique Hotel Cézanne have free WiFi access and air-conditioned during hot season. All rooms include satellite TV with more than 50 channels and some have views over the town.

Private secured parking is available on site for an additional fee.
Facilities: Private Parking, Free Wifi, Family rooms, Non-smoking rooms, Facilities for disabled guests, Airport shuttle, Room service, Tea/Coffee Maker in All Rooms, Bar, Excellent Breakfast

Description:
Located just of the famous Cours Mirabeau in the heart of the old town of Aix-en-Provence, Hotel Les Augustins is set within the walls of a 12th-century convent.

Hotel Les Augustins features a subtle blend of historic and modern architecture and a magnificent lobby.

The hotel features spacious rooms combining traditional architecture and modern facilities. Each room provides air conditioning, a TV and a mini-bar.

A continental breakfast is served every morning in the dining room or in the comfort of guest rooms. There is also free Wi-Fi access in the entire hotel and a 24-hour reception,
Facilities: Parking, Free Wifi, Family rooms, Non-smoking rooms, Room service, 24-hour front desk, Bar, Good Breakfast

Hotel_Name: Grand Hôtel Roi René Aix - MGallery Collection
Description:
Located just a 5-minute walk from Cours Mirabeau and the center of Aix-en-Provence, Grand Hôtel Roi René Aix en Provence Center - MGallery is a 4-star hotel featuring a heated seasonal outdoor pool open from April to the end of september. It also features a terrace, a fitness center and free WiFi access.

Each air-conditioned guest room has been decorated in a contemporary style and includes a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a mini-bar and a safe. The private bathroom comes with either a bath or shower, bathrobes, a hairdryer, slippers and free Occitane toiletries. All rooms have a Nespresso coffee machine.

Traditional French cuisine is served in the hotel's restaurant, La Table du Roi. Guests can enjoy a drink in L’intemporel bar.

Grand Hôtel Roi René - MGallery Collection is 1312 feet from the train station. Private parking is available upon request and for an additional fee.

The hotel is part of the “Green key” label, committed for a sustainable tourism of Restaurants and accommodations in France.
Facilities: Outdoor swimming pool, Private Parking, Free Wifi, Restaurant, Fitness center, Non-smoking rooms, Facilities for disabled guests, Tea/Coffee Maker in All Rooms, Bar, Excellent Breakfast

Description:
Set 2625 ft from Cours Mirabeau in Aix-en-Provence, Villa Saint-Ange hotel features a heated outdoor swimming pool, a Provencal garden, and a French restaurant and bar with a terrace. This property is 1.4 mi from Saint-Sauveur Cathedral.

Rooms are spread across five 18th-century bastide-style cottages, decorated in the style of an Aix-en-Provence town house. All rooms include air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with international channels, a safety deposit box, and a mini-bar. The private bathroom has free toiletries and a hair dryer. Rooms on ground level feature a terrace or garden.

There is an on-site restaurant with a terrace, which serves a variety of French dishes and also offers vegetarian and vegan options. Room service is available 24/7.

Guests can make use of the hot tub and fitness room, or enjoy a massage at a supplement. Hiking is among the activities that guests can enjoy near the accommodations.

Speaking English and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always on hand to help.

Caumont Art Center is 2297 ft away. Marseille Provence Airport is 19 mi from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service. Covered parking is available on site at a supplement.
Facilities: Outdoor swimming pool, Private Parking, Spa, Free Wifi, Restaurant, Fitness center, Non-smoking rooms, Facilities for disabled guests, Airport shuttle, Exceptional Breakfast

Description:
This 3-star hotel is located in the center of Aix-en-Provence, a 1-minute walk from Thermes Sextius thermal baths and 1804 feet from Cours Mirabeau. Free WiFi is available.

Rooms are contemporary and offer a terrace with a panoramic view over the city and the Mont Sainte-Victoire Mountain.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning, and free Wi-Fi access is available throughout the hotel.

With a 24-hour reception, the Hotel escaletto offers easy access to all the main tourist attractions of
Aix-en-Provence.
Facilities: Private Parking, Free Wifi, Family rooms, Non-smoking rooms, Facilities for disabled guests, 24-hour front desk, Terrace, Bar, Very Good Breakfast

Hotel_Name: Hôtel Particulier Le 28 - Spa & Art Luxury Design by Alain Ducasse
Description:
Featuring a private garden with 2 terraces and an on-site restaurant, Hôtel Particulier Le 28 - Spa & Art Luxury Design by Alain Ducasse is located in Aix-en-Provence. Private parking is available on site. The swimming pool and spa are located in a spa 820 feet from the hotel. Our guests benefit from special rates and advantages. The spa is open from 10 am to 5.30 PM. Acces and treatment on reservation

The air-conditioned rooms include a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Certain rooms feature a seating area where you can relax. All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom equipped with a bath. Hôtel Particulier Le 28 - Spa & Art Luxury Design by Alain Ducasse features free WiFi.

Breakfast with local products is available. Guests can dine in the garden. There is also a babysitting service offered at the property.

Cours Mirabeau is 656 feet from Hôtel Particulier Le 28 - Spa & Art Luxury Design by Alain Ducasse, while Saint-Sauveur Cathedral is 2625 feet from the property. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 13 mi from Hôtel Particulier Le 28 - Spa & Art Luxury Design by Alain Ducasse.
Facilities: Indoor swimming pool, Private Parking, Spa, Free Wifi, Family rooms, Restaurant, Non-smoking rooms, Airport shuttle, Bar, Very Good Breakfast

Description:
In the heart of Aix-en-Provence, the La Caravelle hotel welcomes you less than an 8-minute walk from the Cours Mirabeau, the Granet Museum and the Palais des Congrès.

All rooms have air conditioning, a desk and a private bathroom with a bath or shower.

A la carte breakfast is served every morning at La Caravelle. A continental breakfast is also available at a reduced rate includes a hot drink, a croissant, a glass of fruit juice, bread, butter and jam.

The hotel includes video surveillance and free computer access in public areas. Public parking is nearby, and a private parking is also available on site for an additional fee (reservation is needed before arrival, 3 spots available)

Establishment undergoing renovation but remains open to the public.
Model photos of the establishment from 2024.

This hotel has been entirely renewed.
Facilities: Private Parking, Free Wifi, Family rooms, Non-smoking rooms, Facilities for disabled guests, Room service, 24-hour front desk, Tea/Coffee Maker in All Rooms, Good Breakfast

Hotel_Name: La Maison d'Aix 1785 - Hôtel Particulier & Spa
Description:
La Maison d’Aix is located in the Mazarin quarter of Aix-en-Provence, a 3-minute walk from the Cours Mirabeau. It offers a small indoor pool, relaxation area and hammam. Free WiFi is provided.

This luxury hotel offers free tea and Nespresso coffee.

Guests are invited to relax in Le Salon Rouge, which is equipped with a flat-screen TV. Breakfast is served daily and La Maison d’Aix also serves afternoon tea with home-made pastries.
Facilities: Indoor swimming pool, Parking, Spa, Free Wifi, Family rooms, Non-smoking rooms, Airport shuttle, Bar, Breakfast

Hotel_Name: Hôtel de la Rotonde Aix en Provence
Description:
Hôtel de la Rotonde Aix en Provence is located in central Aix-en-Provence,5 minutes walk from the Bus station.

Free WiFi is provided. On-site parking is available on request only, with an extra charge of 15 euros per night.

It offers soundproofed rooms with air conditioning, satellite TV and a mini-bar. Each has a bathroom with hairdryer.

Hôtel de la Rotonde Aix en Provence serves a continental buffet breakfast. Guests can also enjoy a drink at the bar or on the shaded terrace.

The hotel is 984 feet from Cours Mirabeau and 19 mi from Marseille Provence Airport.
Facilities: Private Parking, Free Wifi, Family rooms, Non-smoking rooms, Facilities for disabled guests, Room service, 24-hour front desk, Tea/Coffee Maker in All Rooms, Bar, Breakfast

Description:
Negrecoste Hôtel & Spa is an 18th century hotel with a sun terrace, set in the heart of the Cours Mirabeau, a 10-minute walk from Aix-en-Provence SNCF Train and Bus Station. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

The air-conditioned guest rooms feature an LCD TV and a paid mini-bar. The private bathrooms are equipped with a bath or shower, free Nuxe toiletries and a hairdryer. Some of the rooms also offer a view of the Cours Mirabeau.

Meeting facilities are available and there is a 24-hour reception. Upon reservation and for an extra charge, guests can relax in the onsite spa with a hot tub, sauna and hammam and guests benefit from reduced rates for a 1-hour spa pass and for the onsite treatments.

Bars, shops and restaurants can be found within 328 feet of the hotel. Other local attractions include the city's cathedral, a 5-minute walk away. The nearest airport is Marseille Marignane, 16 mi from the hotel. Paid private parking is available on site upon reservation.
Facilities: Private Parking, Spa, Free Wifi, Family rooms, 2 restaurants, Non-smoking rooms, Facilities for disabled guests, Tea/Coffee Maker in All Rooms, Bar, Very Good Breakfast

Hotel_Name: Best Western Hotel le Galice Aix-en-Provence
Description:
Located a 10-minute walk from the center of Aix-en-Provence, Best Western Le Galice Center Ville features a seasonal outdoor pool and a terrace. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, a desk, a kettle and a mini-bar. The private bathrooms have a bath or shower and a hairdryer.

The hotel has business facilities, including fully equipped meeting rooms open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. There is also a 24-hour reception.

Best Western Le Galice Center Ville is 16 mi from Marseille Provence Airport and 9.3 mi from Aix-en-Provence TGV Train Station. A secured underground car park is available for an extra fee.
Facilities: Outdoor swimming pool, Private Parking, Free Wifi, Family rooms, Non-smoking rooms, Facilities for disabled guests, 24-hour front desk, Terrace, Bar, Good Breakfast

Description:
Les Quatre Dauphins is a hotel set in a former private mansion in the heart of Aix-en-Provence, just 164 feet away from Quatre Dauphins Square and 1148 feet from Cours Mirabeau. The property is a 5-minute drive from Aix-en-Provence Train Station. Free WiFi is included.

An elegant stairwell leads to the guest rooms in this 3-story hotel (please note, we do not have an elevator). Decorated in a Provençal style, each room comes with private bathroom and satellite TV. The rooms of the top floor have exposed wooden beams.

The central location of the Quatre Dauphins hotel allows you to visit the old part of Aix-en-Provence. Paid public parking is available 984 feet from the property.
Facilities: Free Wifi, Non-smoking rooms, 24-hour front desk, Excellent Breakfast

Description:
Elegant Accommodations: Le Pigonnet - Esprit de France in Aix-en-Provence offers a 5-star hotel experience with a sun terrace, garden, seasonal outdoor swimming pool, and free WiFi.

Exceptional Facilities: Guests enjoy a family-friendly restaurant serving French, Mediterranean, and local cuisines, a bar, and outdoor seating areas. Additional amenities include a fitness center, spa, and free on-site private parking.

Comfortable Rooms: Rooms feature air-conditioning, private bathrooms, and modern amenities such as mini-bars and flat-screen TVs. Family rooms and interconnected rooms cater to various needs.

Prime Location: Located 16 mi from Marseille Provence Airport, the hotel is near attractions like Noter-Dame de la Garde Basilica (21 mi) and Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Center (19 mi). Guests appreciate the attentive staff and excellent service.
Facilities: Outdoor swimming pool, Free parking, Free Wifi, Family rooms, 2 restaurants, Non-smoking rooms, Room service, Tea/Coffee Maker in All Rooms, Bar, Very Good Breakfast

Description:
Located 1640 feet from the Granet Museum, Hôtel Le Mozart offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. It is easily accessed from Motorway A8, a 3-minute drive away.

Additional facilities in the rooms include an LCD TV with satellite channels. The rooms also provide a telephone and an private bathroom, which is complete with a bath or shower.

You can enjoy the buffet breakfast in the dining room or on the terrace.

Free private parking is available onsite. Alternatively, guests can keep their vehicle in the secure garage for a supplementary cost and upon reservation. Electric car charging station is available subject to availability. Newspapers are also available at the 24-hour reception.
Facilities: Private Parking, Free Wifi, Family rooms, Non-smoking rooms, Room service, Terrace, Garden, Tea/Coffee Maker in All Rooms, Very Good Breakfast

Description:
Ideally located on a peaceful street in the center of Aix-en-Provence, this residence is a 10-minute walk from the cafés and fountains on Cours Mirabeau. Gare d’Aix-en-Provence is 2953 feet away. Free WiFi is available in all areas.

Apartments and studios at Aparthotel Adagio Aix en Provence Center are contemporary in style and offer an LCD TV. All have a kitchen with hotplates and some have a separate bedroom.

Breakfast and drinks and snacks vending machines are some of the other facilities on offer at Aparthotel Adagio Aix en Provence Center. There is also a 24-hour reception with luggage storage and a dry cleaning service.

Rotonde Square is a 5-minute walk away and Aix-en-Provence Natural History Museum is just 2789 feet from the residence. For guests arriving by car, private indoor parking is possible on site, according to availability. A8 highway is 1.6 mi away.
Facilities: Private Parking, Free Wifi, Family rooms, Non-smoking rooms, Facilities for disabled guests, 24-hour front desk, Garden, Good Breakfast

Description:
Le Concorde is ideally located in the center of Aix-en-Provence, only a 5-minute walk from the famous Cour Mirabeau and near the Granet Museum. It offers a flowered garden.

The guest rooms all feature a TV, air-conditioning and Wi-Fi access.

You can start the day with a generous breakfast in the breakfast room or in the courtyard.

For guests arriving by car, the hotel has a large private garage in the basement available for an additional charge, allowing you to explore the city without any parking worries.
Facilities: Private Parking, Free Wifi, Family rooms, Non-smoking rooms, Facilities for disabled guests, Terrace, Garden, Tea/Coffee Maker in All Rooms, Good Breakfast

Description:
Located in Aix-en-Provence, 19 miles from Joliette Metro Station, Hotel Cardinal features views of the city. The 2-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. The property is 400 yards from the city center and 19 miles from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station.

At the hotel, the rooms include a desk. Selected rooms also feature a kitchenette with a fridge, a microwave and a stovetop. All rooms in Hotel Cardinal are equipped with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast.

Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Center is 20 miles from Hotel Cardinal, while Vieux Port Metro Station is 20 miles from the property. Marseille Provence Airport is 17 miles away.
Facilities: Free Wifi, Non-smoking rooms, Good Breakfast

Description:
This Séjours & Affaires residence is located in Aix-en-Provence near the Cours Mirabeau. It offers furnished studios and free Wi-Fi internet access.

All of the studios at Séjours & Affaires Aix-en-Provence Mirabeau are soundproof and have a complete kitchen area with fridge, microwave, hotplates and dishes. All of them are serviced by an elevator.

The studios have fold-out sofa beds, and a house cleaning including the change of linens are provided once a week.
Facilities: Private Parking, Free Wifi, Family rooms, Non-smoking rooms, Good Breakfast

Description:
Comfortable Accommodations: Hôtel Bellegarde by Viktor in Aix-en-Provence offers air-conditioned rooms with private bathrooms, free WiFi, and modern amenities. Each room includes a work desk, TV, and wardrobe, ensuring a pleasant stay.

Exceptional Facilities: Guests can relax on the sun terrace or enjoy a drink at the bar. The hotel provides free WiFi, a lounge, and a coffee shop, catering to all leisure needs.

Convenient Location: Located 17 mi from Marseille Provence Airport, the hotel is near attractions such as Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Center (20 mi) and Noter-Dame de la Garde Basilica (21 mi). A restaurant is available in the surroundings.

 Hôtel Bellegarde by Viktor is highly rated by guests for its excellent service and comfortable accommodations.
Facilities: Free Wifi, Non-smoking rooms, Facilities for disabled guests, Bar, Wonderful Breakfast

Description:
Located in the heart of Aix-en-Provence, Hôtel de France is located in a street parallel to Cours Mirabeau only 164 feet from the famous Fontaine de la Rotonde, and offers air conditioned rooms with free WiFi access.

Decorated with white and beige shades, all rooms at Hôtel de France feature a TV with satellite channels, a desk and a mini-bar. The private bathroom comes with a bathtub or a shower and Nuxe products.

Breakfast is served daily and can be enjoyed in the dining room. The property is located near numerous restaurants, bars and markets.

Other facilities available at Hôtel de France include a 24-hour front desk and a shared lounge. The property's location makes it an excellent base to discover Aix-en-Provence, which train station is just a 10-minute walk from the hotel.
Facilities: Free Wifi, Non-smoking rooms, Facilities for disabled guests, Room service, 24-hour front desk, Breakfast

Description:
Radisson Aix en Provence is located on the exit of the A8 and A51 motorways, just 10 minutes' drive from the center of Aix-en-Provence and Paul Cézanne’s house. It features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and free WiFi. The hotel was completely renovated in April 2019.

All the rooms at Radisson Aix en Provence come with a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV with Canal+ and satellite channels. They are decorated in a contemporary style.

The "Tulipe" restaurant is open daily (expect the week-end during low-season) and offers traditional, gourmet and local cuisine.

Guests can relax on the terrace with deckchairs and a barbecue. There is also a fitness room and an air-conditioned relaxation area with a dry sauna and shower which can be privatized.

There are theaters, a golf course and a cinema all within close proximity of the hotel. Located on the western outskirts of town, the hotel is 1.2 mi from Cours Mirabeau. An underground garage is available for parking for an extra charge
Facilities: Outdoor swimming pool, Private Parking, Free Wifi, Restaurant, Fitness center, Non-smoking rooms, Facilities for disabled guests, Tea/Coffee Maker in All Rooms, Bar, Very Good Breakfast

Description:
Located 1.2 mi from the village of Les Milles and 5 mi from the center of Aix-en-Provence, Domaine Gaogaia offers hotel accommodations with an outdoor pool, a garden and a terrace. Guests also have access to free WiFi and free on-site parking.

All rooms are air conditioned and feature a desk and a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom comes with a shower and a hairdryer. Deluxe rooms have a bath, a shower and a separate toilet. Additional facilities offered at the property include meeting facilities, a shared lounge and ironing services.

Guests can enjoy a meal made with fresh and seasonal ingredients in the on-site restaurant opened from Monday to Saturday and Sundays for lunch only. Beforehand reservations for the restaurant are strongly advised.

Activities in the local area include golf and hiking. Les Milles, Domaine Gaogaia is a 10-minute drive from Aix-en-Provence city center where a number of shops, bars, restaurants and cafes can be found. The nearest beaches are a 35-minute drive from the hotel.

Marseille Provence Airport is 12 mi away and Aix-en-Provence Train Station is located 6.2 mi from the property.
Facilities: Outdoor swimming pool, Free parking, Free Wifi, Family rooms, Restaurant, Non-smoking rooms, Facilities for disabled guests, 24-hour front desk, Bar, Good Breakfast

Description:
Set in 5-hectare park with vineyards and Olive trees, Les Lodges Sainte-Victoire is a hotel decorated in an elegant style. The property was built in the 18th property and includes spa facilities as well as 2 swimming pools.

The rooms and suites at Les Lodges Sainte-Victoire have a mini-bar, an LCD TV with cable channels and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. A kettle is available in the rooms.

A gourmet-style restaurant is available on site and offers meals made with seasonal and local products. A homemade buffet breakfast is also available daily and you can enjoy a drink at the bar. Children under the age of 8 benefit from free breakfast.

Other facilities are available such as a sun terrace, luggage storage and free Wi-Fi access, available throughout. The spa facilities include a steam bath, a sauna and a fitness center.

The hotel is located 6.2 mi from Sainte-Victoire Mountain and 3.7 mi from the center of Aix-en-Provence. There is free, private car park on site which does not require reservation. A charging station for electric cars is available at this property.
Facilities: 3 swimming pools, Free parking, Spa, Free Wifi, Family rooms, 2 restaurants, Non-smoking rooms, Tea/Coffee Maker in All Rooms, Bar, Very Good Breakfast

Description:
La Mirande, dating back to 1309, is a hotel located in Avignon's city center. It offers 18th-century style guest rooms with views through the antique windows overlooking the Palais des Papes. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and private parking is available on site.

Each of the soundproofed air-conditioned guest rooms at La Mirande are decorated with a different wall tapestry, and have oak-wood parquet flooring and silk-lined curtains. All rooms have a private marble finish bathroom with a bath and some offer a view of the Palais des Papes. Some rooms also have a shower.

In the morning, there is a choice of an American or a continental breakfast served either in the hotel's restaurant or in the privacy of the guest's room. Guests at La Mirande can enjoy gourmet cuisine in the main restaurant or relax with a drink in the hotel bar in the evening. They can also experience the 'Table Haute' Chef's table for dinner, upon reservation and on certain evenings only. Cooking lessons can also be taken at La Mirande.

Guests will also find a gift shop on site which offers local produce, linen, decorative items, porcelain tableware and handbags.

La Mirande is 41 mi from Marseille Provence Airport, and there is a shuttle service available. Calvet Museum is just 984 feet away. There is a valet parking service available on site.
Facilities: Private Parking, Free Wifi, Family rooms, Restaurant, Non-smoking rooms, Facilities for disabled guests, Room service, 24-hour front desk, Bar, Breakfast

Description:
Ideally located inside the ramparts in the center of Avignon, Hôtel Le Bristol offers air-conditioned rooms, a bar, free WiFi and a shared lounge. There is also a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service.

Just a 15-minute walk to the Palais des Papes, the rooms are equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

Guests at Hôtel Le Bristol can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

The nearest airport is Avignon-Provence Airport, 5.6 mi from Hôtel Le Bristol.
Facilities: Free Wifi, Family rooms, Non-smoking rooms, Facilities for disabled guests, 24-hour front desk, Bar, Very Good Breakfast

Hotel_Name: Hôtel Le Médiéval Palais des Papes
Description:
Le Médiéval is set in a former cardinal's palace in Avignon historic center. This 17th-century building is a 5-minute walk from the Popes Palace and offers a floral patio with a fountain.

Accessed via a staircase, each air-conditioned room has a satellite TV and some feature a bathtub. They are also equipped with a direct dial phone, a work desk and free WiFi is available in the entire hotel Le Medieval.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning and the hotel is close to many shops and restaurants.

The hotel includes a TV room and a library.

Le Medieval is 3.1 mi from Avignon TGV train Station and 6.2 mi from Avignon Airport. Public parking is available nearby at a discounted rate.
Facilities: Free Wifi, Family rooms, Non-smoking rooms, 24-hour front desk, Garden, Tea/Coffee Maker in All Rooms, Very Good Breakfast

Description:
Aparthotel Adagio Access Avignon is located by the Avignon TGV Train Station, only 10 minutes' drive from the town center. The residence offers air-conditioned apartments and studios with a well-equipped kitchenette.

The studios and apartments have a simple décor. They include satellite TV, free internet access and a private bathroom.

Enjoy breakfast at the Aparthotel Adagio Access Avignon’s charming breakfast room. All rooms are serviced by a elevator.

The residence is less than a 10-minute drive from the Palais des Papes and the Pont d’Avignon. Paid parking is available on site (reservation is not possible).
Facilities: Private Parking, Free Wifi, Family rooms, Non-smoking rooms, Good Breakfast

Description:
Set in an 18th-century building, next to Avignon Train Station, this 3-star family hotel is a 20-minute walk from Avignon Papal Palace and Pont d'Avignon. Altera Roma Hôtel provides free WiFi and paid private parking.

Altera Roma Hôtel features guest rooms overlooking a garden, as well as apartments and studios in an annex building for longer stays.

Free buffet breakfast is offered to all guests.

Altera Roma Hôtel features also a private taxi service, offering you all the essentials to discover fully the city of Avignon. Avignon-Provence Airport is a 20-minute drive away.
Facilities: Private Parking, Free Wifi, Family rooms, Non-smoking rooms, Facilities for disabled guests, Airport shuttle, Garden, Bar, Excellent Breakfast

Description:
Hôtel Les Corps Saints features a location facing Agricol Perdiguier Square in Avignon's historic city center, 5 minutes' walk from the train station. The rooms include free WiFi. Corps Saints Square is 262 feet from the hotel.

Only accessible by stairs, the rooms come with a TV and have a private bathroom with a shower.

For an additional fee, guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast with cheese, pastries, cold meat, jams, yogurt, boiled and hard boiled eggs. Another breakfast option called 'Bistrot' is available and includes fruit juices, unlimited hot drinks, croissants, fresh bread, jams and homemade butter. Restaurants can be found less than 328 feet away.

Papal Palace is a 10 minutes' walk away. Public parking is available nearby for an additional charge. Avignon TGV train station is 9.3 mi away.
Facilities: Free Wifi, Family rooms, Non-smoking rooms, Very Good Breakfast

Description:
The 3-star ibis Avignon Sud is ideally located 1.9 mi from the city center, a few minutes from the Pont d’Avignon and Avignon Convention Center. It features an outdoor swimming pool with a sun terrace and a garden.

The 93 air-conditioned rooms include free WiFi access and satellite TV and Canal + Channel. The modern rooms all have a private bathroom fitted with a bathtub or shower.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savory dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

Meals and snacks are available from the hotel’s restaurant, and the bar with its terrace is open 24/7.

The hotel is located in the heart of Provence and the Châteauneuf du Pape vineyards. Avignon Center Train Station is 3.1 mi away. Free private parking is possible on site.
Facilities: Outdoor swimming pool, Free parking, Free Wifi, Family rooms, Restaurant, Non-smoking rooms, Facilities for disabled guests, Room service, Bar, Good Breakfast

Description:
This residence is located in the historic center of Avignon and is a 10-minute walk from the Avignon Central Railway Station, Palais des Papes, the main market square and Avignon Old Town. It offers self-catering studios and apartments with security access and free WiFi.

The apartments and studios at Résidence Les Cordeliers have a TV and dining area.Individual kitchenettes are equipped with kitchenware, a microwave and a refrigerator. Each accommodations has its own bathroom with shower.

Guests are just a 15-minute walk from the Pont d'Avignon. Résidence Les Cordeliers is 22 mi from Arles and 27 mi from Nîmes. Secure bike storage is available onsite and public parking is available 164 feet away.

The residence's private parking lot cannot be reserved in advance. Spaces are allocated according to availability on arrival and are subject to a charge of €15 per night.
Facilities: Private Parking, Free Wifi, Family rooms, Non-smoking rooms, Facilities for disabled guests, Bar, Good Breakfast

Hotel_Name: Hôtel Cap Sud Avignon - Réouverture - Ex Kyriad Hôtel
Description:
Comfortable Accommodations: Hôtel Cap Sud Avignon in Avignon offers comfortable rooms with air-conditioning, private bathrooms, and free WiFi. Each room includes a work desk, TV, and soundproofing for a pleasant stay.

Dining and Leisure: Guests can enjoy a restaurant serving pizza and cocktails, a bar, and a terrace. The hotel features a garden, outdoor seating area, and a coffee shop, providing ample options for relaxation and dining.

Description:

The hotel du Palais des Papes is equipped with comfortable rooms offering a wonderful view on either the Palais des Papes, or on the Horloge Square. Each room offers air conditioning and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

The hotel's restaurant Maison Gayte/Lutrin, suggests a diverse menu inspired by traditional and Provencal cuisine and is renewed with the seasons.

The property is a 5-minute walk from the Pont d'Avignon and a 15-minute walk from Avignon Central Train Station.

Description:
Set in central Avignon, a 15-minute walk from Palais des Papes and Pont d'Avignon, this 16th-century hotel offers an outdoor rooftop pool with a large sun terrace. Some of the stylish rooms are located in the historic building featuring archways and vaulted ceilings. Free WiFi is available.

Each air-conditioned room includes a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All rooms are nonsmoking and have a contemporary bathroom with a hairdryer. Some rooms feature a balcony with views of the courtyard.

Restaurant Le Saint Louis serves traditional French cuisine at Hôtel Cloitre Saint Louis. Guests can dine on the terrace in summer and enjoy drinks in the lounge bar. A buffet breakfast is prepared every morning. An in-room breakfast can be enjoyed at extra cost.

Description:

The nonsmoking rooms and suites come with a seating area, a safe, a flat-screen TV and tea and coffee making facilities. The bathroom facilities include a bath, a shower and free toiletries. Some suites feature a balcony or a terrace and offer views of the property building, the Mediterranean garden or the fortified city of Avignon.

Description:

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savory dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Hotel Astoria is located in the center of Carcassonne, 492 feet from the train station and a 20-minute walk from the medieval city. It offers free Wi-Fi internet access.

Parking in the garage is free for motorbikes and bicycles.

The courthouse is a 5-minute walk away and the Canal du Midi is 164 feet away.
Facilities: Private Parking, Free Wifi, Family rooms, Non-smoking rooms, Airport shuttle, Good Breakfast

Description:
Hotel De La Bastide is a family-run hotel located in the center of Carcassonne, a 5-minute walk from the train station and a 25-minute walk from the medieval city. Free public parking is possible 164 feet away.

The hotel rooms are serviced by a elevator and have air-conditioning, LCD-TV and free WiFi access.

All of the rooms and common areas in the hotel are nonsmoking.

The airport shuttle stops just 492 feet from the hotel.
Facilities: Free Wifi, Family rooms, Non-smoking rooms, Excellent Breakfast

Description:
Ideally located at the foot of the fortified town at Carcassonne, in an 18th-century building, this hotel offers rooms overlooking the castle towers or the hotel’s garden. Free WiFi is provided. Carcassonne city center is 1969 feet away.

Each bedroom features air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bath or shower and free toiletries.

On sunny days you can enjoy your continental buffet breakfast among the flowers on the outdoor terrace.

A range of convenient services are offered at the Hotel Du Pont Vieux. These include packed lunches, as well as bicycle and car rental. The staff at the Pont Vieux are available 24-hours a day to help you organize your stay in Carcassonne.

Garage parking is available upon prior request and subject to availability. Carcassonne Train Station is 1.9 mi away.
Facilities: Private Parking, Free Wifi, Family rooms, Non-smoking rooms, Terrace, Bar, Very Good Breakfast

Description:
Offering a 24-hour front desk, The Originals City, Hôtel Pont Rouge, Carcassonne is located a 10-minute drive from Carcassonne Airport and 3.1 mi from the medieval part of town. It offers 50 rooms decorated in a modern style, all serviced by a elevator. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

All the rooms offer air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. Each room has a private bathroom with a shower.

The hotel serves a buffet breakfast every morning.

Hôtel Pont Rouge is 37 mi from Narbonne. Free secured parking is available on site.
Facilities: Free parking, Free Wifi, Family rooms, Non-smoking rooms, Facilities for disabled guests, 24-hour front desk, Terrace, Good Breakfast

Description:
Hôtel Du Chateau - Les Collectionneurs is 98 feet from the entrance of the medieval Cité de Carcassonne. It features free access to an outdoor pool, and a spa with an indoor pool, hot tub and hammam available for an additional charge. Free WiFi access is available.

The guest rooms at Hôtel Du Chateau are equipped with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. Each room or suite has a private bathroom.

You can enjoy a drink in the panoramic bar, which offers view of the city. Snacking options are available and guests can take cooking classes upon request.

The hotel also has a 24-hour reception and private parking.

The Hôtel Du Chateau is within 984 feet of the N113 motorway exit and the Basilica of Saint Nazaire is 7 minutes' walk away. Saint Celse is just a 5-minute walk from Hôtel Du Chateau - Les Collectionneurs. Carcassonne Train Station is an 8-minute drive away.
Facilities: 2 swimming pools, Private Parking, Spa, Free Wifi, Family rooms, Non-smoking rooms, Facilities for disabled guests, 24-hour front desk, Bar, Good Breakfast

Description:
Brit Hôtel Bosquet Carcassonne is 0.9 mi from the medieval city of Carcassonne, a UNESCO World Heritage site. Free WiFi is provided.

Only accessed by stairs, the air-conditioned guestrooms feature satellite TV with Canal + channel, a bathroom with a hairdryer and a telephone.

A buffet breakfast is served each morning at the hotel.

Restaurants can be found less than 1640 feet away.

In the surroundings, you can discover the Canal du Midi located 2.2 mi from the property and La Cavayère's Lake, a 10-minute drive away. Carcassonne Train Station is 3.1 mi away.
Facilities: Free parking, Free Wifi, Family rooms, Non-smoking rooms, Facilities for disabled guests, Terrace, Tea/Coffee Maker in All Rooms, Very Good Breakfast

Description:
ibis Carcassonne Center is ideally located 0.6 mi from Carcassonne's Train Station and only 2625 feet from the medieval heart of the city. It offers a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned guest rooms with free WiFi.

A flat-screen satellite TV and a desk are provided in each guest room. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer and toiletries.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savory dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00. A snack bar provides food throughout the day.

Part of the 17th-century Canal du Midi is 1640 feet from the hotel and Jean Alary Theater, the Fine Arts Museum and Comtal Castle are all within a 10-minute walk. Pont-Rouge Industrial Zone is 10 minutes' drive away and Carcassonne Airport is 13 minutes' drive from the hotel.
Facilities: Parking, Free Wifi, Non-smoking rooms, Facilities for disabled guests, 24-hour front desk, Terrace, Bar, Good Breakfast

Description:
Comfortable Accommodations: Le Meez in Carcassonne offers spacious rooms with air-conditioning, private bathrooms, and modern amenities. Guests enjoy balconies with pool or city views, ensuring a relaxing stay.

Exceptional Facilities: The hotel features a spa, swimming pool with a view, fitness center, sun terrace, and free WiFi. Additional services include a restaurant, bar, and outdoor seating area, catering to all guest needs.

Dining Experience: A family-friendly restaurant serves French, Mediterranean, and international cuisines with halal, vegetarian, vegan, and gluten-free options. Breakfast includes continental, American, and à la carte selections.

 Located 3.7 mi from Carcassonne Airport and 1.2 mi from Comtal Castle, Le Meez is near Memorial House (Maison des Memoires) at 1.9 mi. Guests appreciate the room comfort, attentive staff, and excellent restaurant.
Facilities: Outdoor swimming pool, Free parking, Spa, Free Wifi, Family rooms, Restaurant, Non-smoking rooms, Tea/Coffee Maker in All Rooms, Bar, Very Good Breakfast

Description:
Just 164 feet from the main entrance of the medieval city of Carcassonne, this modern hotel features a view of the city's ramparts and the surrounding countryside. Guests can enjoy an outdoor swimming pool and a 2-hectare private garden.

Rooms have a combination of classic and contemporary décor and feature a flat screen TV with satellite channels and an iPod docking station. Rooms are equipped with an electric kettle. Each has an private bathroom with a bath or shower, a bathrobe, slippers and free toiletries.

A gourmet French buffet breakfast is served daily for a supplement. Several restaurants are located 164 feet away and additional restaurants and grocery shops can be found 1.2 mi away in the center of Carcassone.

Cathar castles are located as close as 12 mi from the property and Toulouse is a 50-minute drive away. Motorway A61 is 3.1 mi away and Carcassonne Train Station is 1.9 mi away. A taxi stand and a bus stop are located in front of the building. Private parking is available.
Facilities: Outdoor swimming pool, Private Parking, Free Wifi, Family rooms, Non-smoking rooms, Facilities for disabled guests, 24-hour front desk, Tea/Coffee Maker in All Rooms, Bar, Wonderful Breakfast

Description:
This B&B hotel is located in Grenoble, just 2625 feet from Alpexpo. With a 24-hour reception, it offers a free Wi-Fi connection and soundproofed accommodations. It is 656 feet from Grand Place Tram Station.

All of the rooms at B&B Grenoble Center Alpexpo are serviced by a elevator and are decorated in a contemporary style. Each room features a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower.

A continental breakfast is served every morning in the communal lounge.

Luggage storage is provided at B&B Grenoble Center Alpexpo. There are limited parking places available free of charge, and the Bastille is 4.3 mi away. There is access to A480 motorway, 3.1 mi away.
Facilities: Free parking, Free Wifi, Family rooms, Non-smoking rooms, Facilities for disabled guests, 24-hour front desk, Good Breakfast

Description:
Tempologis Grenoble is located in Grenoble and offers self-catering accommodations. Free WiFi access is available. The property is 0.6 mi from Paul Mistral Park and 1.6 mi from Grenoble Train Station.

Apartments at Tempologis Grenoble feature a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a seating area. There is a full a kitchenette with a dishwasher and a microwave. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. You can enjoy mountain view and city view from the room.

Grenoble-Isère Airport is 27 mi away.
Facilities: Free parking, Free Wifi, Family rooms, Non-smoking rooms, Facilities for disabled guests

Description:
The Hôtel Gloria is located in central Grenoble, 656 feet from the A48 motorway and 984 feet from Grenoble's School of Management.

Each air-conditioned guest room has a private bathroom, satellite TV and free WiFi access.

Guests of the Gloria can enjoy a continental breakfast in the hotel dining room.

The hotel is just 656 feet from the nearest tramway stop offering connections throughout the city, 0.6 mi from Grenoble cathedral and 2625 feet from the Musée Dauphinois. Grenoble SNCF Train Station is just 656 feet away.
Facilities: Private Parking, Free Wifi, Family rooms, Non-smoking rooms, Good Breakfast

Description:
Hôtel de l'Europe Grenoble hyper-center is located in the heart of Grenoble and is the oldest hotel in the city. It is set in a 17th-century building. Free WiFi is provided.

All rooms are air-conditioned and soundproofed. They come with a flat-screen TV with Bein Sports, Canal+ and Eurosport satellite channels. Some rooms also feature a balcony with views of the city.

Hôtel de l'Europe Grenoble hyper-center offers a daily continental breakfast, which can also be served in the guest room upon request.

Hôtel de l'Europe Grenoble hyper-center is 1148 feet from the cable car that goes up to the Bastille. Grenoble train station is 0.6 mi away, or a 5-minute journey by tram. Public parking is available nearby.
Facilities: Parking, Free Wifi, Family rooms, Non-smoking rooms, 24-hour front desk, Very Good Breakfast

Hotel_Name: The Babel Community Hôtel - Grenoble Bastille
Description:
Prime City Center Location: The Babel Community Hôtel - Grenoble Bastille in Grenoble offers a central position with stunning views of the city, mountains, and garden. Guests enjoy easy access to local attractions such as Grenoble Train Station (1.2 mi) and The Bastille Grenoble (16-minute walk).

Exceptional Facilities: The aparthotel features a sun terrace, garden, restaurant, bar, and free WiFi. Additional amenities include a fitness room, shuttle service, concierge, evening entertainment, and a business area. Free on-site parking and bicycle parking enhance the stay.

 Rooms offer air-conditioning, private bathrooms, kitchens, and modern amenities. Guests can relax in the outdoor seating area or take advantage of the bicycle hire and bike parking services.

 The family-friendly restaurant serves local cuisine with traditional, modern, and romantic ambiances. Breakfast is available as a buffet, and lunch and dinner are served daily.
Facilities: Free parking, Free Wifi, Family rooms, Restaurant, Non-smoking rooms, Bar, Good Breakfast

Description:
Maison Barbillon Grenoble - Centre Gare is located in Grenoble, just 328 feet from the train station. It offers comfortable guest rooms with satellite TV and free WiFi Internet access.

Guest rooms at the Maison Barbillon Grenoble - Centre Gare have an authentic and elegant décor and feature a private bathroom including a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the breakfast room. There are many restaurants within walking distance of the hotel.

Maison Barbillon is accessible via the A480 motorway. The hotel is located beside Grenoble World Trade Center and Saint-André Cathedral is just a 13-minute walk away.
Facilities: Free Wifi, Family rooms, Non-smoking rooms, 24-hour front desk, Room service, Excellent Breakfast

Description:
Comfortable Accommodations: RockyPop Grenoble Hotel in Grenoble offers family rooms with air-conditioning, private bathrooms, and modern amenities. Each room includes a work desk, free toiletries, and soundproofing for a pleasant stay.

Exceptional Facilities: Guests can enjoy a sauna, fitness center, and a beautiful garden. The terrace provides outdoor seating, while the restaurant serves lunch and dinner with a variety of cuisines. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

Delicious Breakfast: A diverse breakfast is served daily, including continental, American, buffet, full English/Irish, vegetarian, vegan, and gluten-free options. Fresh pastries, pancakes, cheese, fruits, and warm dishes are available to start the day.

Prime Location: Located 30 mi from Alpes–Isère Airport, the hotel is a short walk from Grenoble Train Station and near attractions such as the Alps Stadium and World Trade Center. Winter sports and an ice-skating rink are available in the surroundings.
Facilities: Private Parking, Free Wifi, Fitness center, Family rooms, Restaurant, Non-smoking rooms, 24-hour front desk, Tea/Coffee Maker in All Rooms, Bar, Very Good Breakfast

Description:
Located 656 feet from Stade Lesdiguières, Kyriad Grenoble Center offers 3-star accommodations with 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Alpexpo convention center is 1.9 mi away from the property. A private car park under video surveillance is available for guests and is free of charge.

All rooms are air-conditioned and equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, including Canal+. The private bathrooms come with a bath and free toiletries. Tea and coffee making facilities are provided.

Room service and bar access are available 24/7 and the hotel serves a buffet breakfast every day.

La Bastille Grenoble cable-car is 2.5 mi from the accommodations, while  Grenoble train station is 1.9 mi away and accessible in 10 minutes with the tramway. Grenoble - Isère Airport is 29 mi away.
Facilities: Free parking, Free Wifi, Family rooms, Non-smoking rooms, Facilities for disabled guests, 24-hour front desk, Room service, Tea/Coffee Maker in All Rooms, Bar, Very Good Breakfast

Description:
Hôtel d’Angleterre Grenoble Hyper-Center is set in the heart of Grenoble, opposite the gardens of Place Victor Hugo. It is just a 1-minute walk to the Victor Hugo tram stop and offers free WiFi and an onsite bar .

All the rooms are soundproofed and air-conditioned. They feature a desk, a LCD satellite TV and a DVD player. The private bathrooms come with free toiletries. Some rooms also have a hydro-massage bathtub and a private balcony with views over the Vercors mountain range.

A buffet breakfast is available every day and includes hot, cold, sweet and savory options. An other continental breakfast option consisting of a hot drink, a juice, a pasty, bread, butter and jam is also available.

An underground car park is available nearby at an extra charge.  The nearest airport is Grenoble - Isère Airport, 28 mi from the accommodations.
Facilities: Parking, Free Wifi, Family rooms, Non-smoking rooms, 24-hour front desk, Room service, Very Good Breakfast

Hotel_Name: Le Grand Hôtel Grenoble, BW Premier Collection by Best Western
Description:
In the heart of the historic city center of the Capital of the Alps, the Grand Hôtel de Grenoble **** BW Premier Collection is waiting to welcome you to an unforgettable experience.

Whether you are on a business trip or a sporting getaway, our attentive and dedicated team is here to offer you a quality of service that lives up to your expectations and up-to-date facilities.

Relax in our newly refurbished rooms and suites. Enjoy a breakfast of fresh, local and seasonal produce. Bring your best projects to life in our coworking space.
At the Grand Hôtel de Grenoble **** BW Premier Collection, every detail is carefully orchestrated to make your stay an unforgettable experience. We look forward to welcoming you and offering you an exceptional stay in Grenoble.

Our hotel is located in the heart of a pedestrianized street, and can be reached by public transport or by car by parking in the Saint-Claire Les Halles private car park, formerly the Lafayette car park (preferential rate).
Facilities: Parking, Free Wifi, Family rooms, Non-smoking rooms, Airport shuttle, Facilities for disabled guests, 24-hour front desk, Room service, Bar, Very Good Breakfast

Description:
Residhotel Grenette is located in central Grenoble, a 3-minute walk away from Place Victor Hugo. It offers self-catering accommodations with free WiFi.

Each unit has a living area with work desk and cable TV.  The kitchenette features a hot-plate, microwave, refrigerator and coffee maker.

The Residhotel provides a daily buffet breakfast service which is served in its breakfast room.

The Grenette is only a 5-minute walk from the historic center of Grenoble, and the train station is 2625 feet away. Private parking spaces are limited and available at an extra charge upon reservation and depending on availability.
Facilities: Parking, Free Wifi, Family rooms, Non-smoking rooms, Facilities for disabled guests, Good Breakfast

Description:
This 4-star Residhome is located in Grenoble, just a 10-minute walk from the city center. It offers accommodations with free WiFi and views of the Vercors and Belledonne Mountains.

Apartments at the Caserne de Bonne Residhome have a fully equipped kitchen and a private bathroom. They are each furnished with a flat-screen TV and a work desk.

Guests of the Residhome Grenoble Caserne De Bonne have access to the sauna and gym area. The resort also provides a 24-hour reception and bar. There is a shopping center with shops and restaurants just 492 feet away.

The Caserne De Bonne is a 15-minute walk from the SNCF train station and just 3 minutes from the nearest Tram stop.
Facilities: Parking, Free Wifi, Family rooms, Non-smoking rooms, Facilities for disabled guests, 24-hour front desk, Good Breakfast

Description:
Located opposite the train station and close to the lively Grenette square, the Residhotel Le Central'Gare offers self-catering accommodations with free WiFi. It features excellent transport links and a meeting room suitable for business functions or seminars. A 24-hour front desk is provided.

All units are fitted with a microwave, fridge, a coffee machine, a stovetop and kettle. They are air conditioned and include a seating area with a flat-screen TV.

A continental breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. The heart of the city with its shops, restaurants and museums is just a 10-minute walk away. You can also take the tram, which stops right outside the hotel.

The nearest airport is Grenoble - Isère Airport, 22 mi from the accommodations. Private parking spaces are limited and available upon reservation and at an additional cost.
Facilities: Private Parking, Free Wifi, Family rooms, Non-smoking rooms, 24-hour front desk, Good Breakfast

Description:
Located in Grenoble, the Hôtel Terminus is opposite the bus and SNCF train stations. It offers air-conditioned and soundproofed rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi access.

The Hôtel Terminus Hotel provides a 24-hour reception and a currency exchange service.

The Terminus is 5 minutes from the World Trade Center and 0.6 mile from the A48 motorway, which provides easy access to Lyon and Geneva.

Guests can use the hotel’s bicycle and car rental services to explore Grenoble and the Rhone-Alpes region.
Facilities: Private Parking, Free Wifi, Family rooms, Non-smoking rooms, 24-hour front desk, Tea/Coffee Maker in All Rooms, Wonderful Breakfast

Description:
Located in the heart of Grenoble on a quiet street, only 1476 feet from the SNCF train station and offers free WiFi, service clean, comfortable rooms with modern facilities and a friendly, relaxed atmosphere.

All the cozy guest rooms are equipped with all modern amneties, private bathrooms, soundproofing and satellite TV. All rooms are served by a small elevator. Some allow you to see the mountain Vercors.

 The helpful staff at this delightful hotel will help you to make the most of your visit. Local and Bio breakfast is served every morning. Guests can find restaurants nearby.

Explore Grenoble on foot, with our bikes available, or using the excellent public transport links. Guests will appreciate the tramwa stop just a stone's throw from the hotel, providing easy access to the city's business districts and famous sites
Facilities: Free Wifi, Non-smoking rooms, Airport shuttle, 24-hour front desk, Bar, Wonderful Breakfast

Description:
Adagio Grenoble Center is located in the Europole business district of Grenoble, a 5-minute walk from the city’s TGV Train Station and a 10-minute walk from the city center. With studios and suites, it offers free WiFi access, a fitness room and a sauna.

All the contemporary studios and suites are equipped with interactive TV and a fully equipped kitchen.

Adagio Grenoble Center serves a daily continental breakfast as well as full concierge services.

Grenobles old town and Noter Dame Cathedral are within easy walking distance. The A480 motorway is 0.8 miles away for guests exploring the Rhone-Alpes region by car.
Facilities: Free Wifi, Family rooms, Non-smoking rooms, Facilities for disabled guests, 24-hour front desk, Good Breakfast

Description:
Featuring a sauna and a fitness center, OKKO Hotels Grenoble Center is located in Grenoble, right next to the Hoche Gardens. This design hotel offers a terrace with views over Hoche Park, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi access.

Each room is air-conditioned and equipped with a flat-screen TV, a desk and a coffee machine. The private bathroom has a shower and comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning. Soft drinks are also included throughout the day free of charge in the lounge, and in the evening guests are offered a small plate of antipasti, delicious dips and seasonal products.

OKKO Hotels Grenoble Jardin Hoche features the Le Club lounge and a library. The hotel is 1640 feet from Paul Mistral Park, 164 feet from La Caserne de Bonne shopping mall and 0.9 mi from Grenoble Train Station.
Facilities: Free Wifi, Fitness center, Restaurant, Non-smoking rooms, Facilities for disabled guests, 24-hour front desk, Bar, Excellent Breakfast

Description:
This residence is a 5-minute walk from Grenoble Train Station and less than 328 feet from Cité Internationale Tram Stop. It is Ideally located in the Europole business district, 2133 feet from the Grenoble School of Management, 1312 feet from the Minatec Complex and 1.1 mi from the CNRS research center.

Séjours & Affaires Grenoble Marie Curie offers studios and apartments with free WiFi access, a seating area with a desk and a flat-screen TV. Each has a fully equipped kitchen with a refrigerator, stove and microwave.They also have a private bathroom, which is complete with free toiletries.

The residence offers a continental breakfast in the breakfast room or on the terrace. Shops and restaurants can be found within 0.6 mile of Séjours & Affaires Grenoble Marie Curie.

Grenoble city center is 1.1 mi away. The property has private parking available at an extra cost. Exit 2 on the A480 motorway is a 3-minute drive away.
Facilities: Private Parking, Free Wifi, Family rooms, Non-smoking rooms, Very Good Breakfast

Description:
The Novotel is set at the heart of Grenoble's business district, only a few steps from the TGV train station. A tram stop is conveniently located just outside the hotel. Many large companies are located close to the Novotel Grenoble Center, and the historical center is only a 10-minute drive away.

The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a desk, a safety deposit box and a mini-bar. Some rooms feature a Nespresso coffee machine. Each room has a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer.

Guests at the Novotel benefit from access to the hotel fitness center. The hotel also features a restaurant, a bar, conference rooms, facilities for the disabled, and private parking at an additional cost. Up to 2 children (16 years and under) stay free when sharing with parents.

This hotel is also just a few miles from the Belledonne Massif and the Vercors Mountains.
Facilities: Private Parking, Free Wifi, Fitness center, Family rooms, Restaurant, Non-smoking rooms, Facilities for disabled guests, Tea/Coffee Maker in All Rooms, Bar, Excellent Breakfast

Description:
Apparthotel Le Hüb Grenoble – Confort et accessibilité au cœur des Alpes

Idéalement situé à seulement 5 minutes à pied de la gare et du quartier Europole, et à 5 minutes en tramway de la Presqu’île scientifique, l’Apparthotel Le Hüb Grenoble est l’adresse parfaite pour un séjour professionnel ou en famille en toute sérénité. Le center-ville est accessible en seulement 15 minutes, offrant un emplacement stratégique pour découvrir Grenoble et ses environs.

L’établissement propose des hébergements modernes et entièrement équipés, alliant confort et autonomie. Chaque logement dispose de la climatisation, d’une cuisine complète avec coin repas, d’une télévision à écran plat ainsi que d’une salle de bains privative avec baignoire et sèche-cheveux. Un micro-ondes, un réfrigérateur, une bouilloire et une machine à café sont également mis à disposition pour un séjour en toute commodité.

Les clients bénéficient d’une connection Wi-Fi gratuite dans tout l’établissement ainsi que d’un parking privé sur place. Chaque matin, un petit-déjeuner buffet varié est proposé pour bien commencer la journée. Pour un moment de détente, une agréable terrasse avec transats est accessible, idéale pour se relaxer après une journée de travail ou d’exploration.

Avec les premières stations de ski à seulement 45 minutes en voiture ou en transports en commun, l’Apparthotel Le Hüb Grenoble constitue un point de départ idéal pour rejoindre la vallée du Grésivaudan, explorer les trois massifs emblématiques – Vercors, Chartreuse et Belledonne – et profiter d’activités de plein air telles que la randonnée ou le ski. Que vous soyez en déplacement professionnel, en vacances ou de passage pour découvrir la région, noter établissement vous offre un cadre chaleureux et fonctionnel, parfaitement adapté à vos besoins.
Facilities: Private Parking, Free Wifi, Family rooms, Non-smoking rooms, Facilities for disabled guests, Good Breakfast

Hotel_Name: Mercure Grenoble Centre Porte des Alpes
Description:
Hotel for travelers seeking local and authentic experiences

Urban, chic, and relaxed, our Mercure hotel embodies natural elegance at the Porte des Alpes. Nestled in the heart of the mountains, this historic hotel with renovated rooms is ideally located for your business stays and meetings or as a stopover on your holiday route. Enjoy our family rooms, relax in the wellness area, and savor local products at the bar restaurant. Appreciate the secure parking and the tranquility of a residential neighborhood, close to the city center, just 656 feet from the tram.

The Mercure Grenoble Center President offers easy access by public transport to the Alpexpo, WTC, and Minatec conference centers. It's 15 minutes from Grenoble train station and a stone's throw from the greenway. Just 10 minutes from the highways, at the gates of the Alps, and close to major winter sports resorts: Villard-de-Lans, Chamrousse, and the 7 Laux.

Grenoble, "Capital of the Alps," is 1 hour from Lyon (A48), Chambéry (A41), and Valence (A49). For your international travel, the nearest airports are Lyon Saint-Exupéry and Geneva Airport.

Welcome to our hotel, just 10 minutes from downtown Grenoble! Here, everything is designed for your well-being: sauna, indoor pool, fitness room, and comfortable rooms. Our restaurant and bar teams have wonderful surprises in store for you!
Facilities: Indoor swimming pool, Private Parking, Free Wifi, Restaurant, Non-smoking rooms, Facilities for disabled guests, 24-hour front desk, Tea/Coffee Maker in All Rooms, Bar, Good Breakfast

Description:
Campanile Grenoble Center Gare is located near a pedestrian and commercial street in Grenoble city center. It features rooms with attached bathroom with free WiFi. The Train Station is 820 feet away.

With double glazing, each room at Campanile Grenoble Center Gare includes an LCD TV with SMART TV and international channels and a private bathroom. A hairdryer is available at the reception, which is open 24 hours per day.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the air-conditioned breakfast room. Guests are invited to visit the Musée de Grenoble, which is 1 mi away, and the Cathedral, which is a 20-minute walk from the hotel.

The Grenoble-Bastille cable car is 0.6 mi away and the Palais des Sports is 1.6 mi away. The Tramway stop is 131 feet away and Grenoble Airport is a 35-minute away. There is an available public parking area that is paid about 656 feet away from the hotel.
Facilities: Parking, Free Wifi, Family rooms, Non-smoking rooms, Facilities for disabled guests, 24-hour front desk, Good Breakfast

Description:
The Mercure Grenoble Center Alpotel is located in the center of Grenoble, just 1.2 miles from Minatec. The hotel offers a restaurant which serves contemporary regional cuisine.

The comfortable guestrooms at this 4-star hotel are air-conditioned and soundproofed, and have Wi-Fi internet access.

A daily buffet breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Every evening, guests will be able to sample regional meals in Café Pourpre, the hotel’s restaurant.

The Mercure Grenoble Center Alpotel is in close proximity to the TGV station and the Alpexpo and WTC convention centers are easily accessible by tramway.
Facilities: Private Parking, Free Wifi, Restaurant, Non-smoking rooms, Facilities for disabled guests, 24-hour front desk, Room service, Tea/Coffee Maker in All Rooms, Bar, Wonderful Breakfast

Description:
This ibis Styles Grenoble Centre Gare is ideally located, just 330 yards from Grenoble Station and 440 yards from the historic center of the city. It offers contemporary accommodations with air conditioning and flat-screen TV.

In the morning, ibis Styles Grenoble Centre Gare serves a full buffet breakfast. Guests can have a drink at the design bar, open every day. Newspapers are provided.

Free Wi-Fi access is available in the entire ibis Styles Grenoble Centre Gare and front desk is open 24 hours.
Facilities: Free Wifi, Family rooms, Facilities for disabled guests, 24-hour front desk, Bar, Good Breakfast

Description:
Park Hôtel Grenoble - MGallery is located in central Grenoble, on the edge of Paul Mistral Park and 2 minutes' walk from a tram stop. It offers contemporary accommodations with free WiFi access. Guest can enjoy a wellness room consisting of a steam bath, experience shower and fitness machines.

Accessed by a elevator, the spacious air-conditioned guest rooms are equipped with satellite TV and a free mini-bar. Each room has a private bathroom stocked with free Clarins toiletries.

The hotel offers meals in its lounge bar or in the comfort of guest rooms, at certain times of the day.

Park Hôtel Grenoble - MGallery is a 5-minute walk from the Palais des Sports and a 10-minute tram ride from the Grenoble World Trade Center.

A one-night parking space with discount rate is available just 492 feet away. Ski slopes and mountain hiking trails are just a 30-minute drive away.
